fields.name: The Ramp
fields.description:
The Ramp is a co-working space, in Peckham. It offers full-time desk option as well as hot-desks, on a monthly basis (two months minimum.) Membership includes use of a meeting room, telephone booths and lockers.

It is on the third floor of an old disused multi-storey carpark, that was converted into into a creative work space.

On other floors of the building you'll find small hip business studios/offices, a food court, bars, art exhibitions, event spaces, and on the roof during the summer, the famous 'Frank's' bar/cafe with it's signature campari cocktails, festival atmosphere, and great views across London.
fields.slogan: Co-working in a hip, colourful converted old multi-storey carpark in Peckham

fields.name: Office Club
fields.address_1: The Bussey Building, Block B, Floor 3, 133 Rye Lane
fields.description:
Nested in the hip Bussey Building, is the Office Club co-working.

It has two offices, a bigger one, with mainly full-time desks, and mainly inhabited by small teams.

Then there is a smaller office mainly home to freelancers, who hang out together, and on the day I visited, were a little hung-over from doing chilli-shot roulette the night before.

The building also hosts, shops, offices, studios, bars,. It often hosts Goldsmith University art student exhibitions, has a festival in the summer, has an open air cinema on the roof, a radio station in a shipping container, and a yoga studio. Membership of the co-working space includes a free fortnightly yoga class.
fields.slogan: Co-working in a close community in an iconic building in Peckham

fields.name: Market Peckham
fields.description:
Spread over at least four levels, the Market Peckham is a co-working space in a building recently renovated in 2019.

The interior decor is to a high standard, like a WeWork, and like a WeWork, Market Peckham seems to mostly host small companies in private offices and feels a little soulless compared to the other offerings in Peckham.

The building is due to also host a cafe, bar, shop and roof terrace, but at the time we visited in Summer 2019 these were still being renovated.
fields.slogan: Co-working with a high standard of interior decor, good for small teams.
